name: Billy's Notebook
description:
Help Sir Hugh Climb the pages! Avoid the sides as it can kill him!! Control:

WASD/Arrow - move

Mouse - aim

Left Click = brush

Right Click = change color

Space = Jump

Power:

red = fast

blue = insta-color

yellow = high jump

green, purple, and orange give you both powerups

black = void, you can pass through

Credits:

Font: https://www.dafont.com/notepad-2.font

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/tommys-first-alphabet-font.html

Team:

Programming: Imon, Celine, Brad

Art: Skylar, Rio, Celine, Jane

Music and Sfx: Alex
